texts.text: Welcome to our Escape Game.
It will take you about 30min to complete
Let's watch this short video about ML!
Let me tell you our story!
My name is Trust. And here are my 4 siblings: Supervision, Monitoring, Administration and Regulation
With me, Trust, we form the SMART system.
My siblings have gone mad, uncontrollable. And they are now
terrorizing the citizen of the Universal Digital Federation.
Can you help fix them?
Sure! I joined the Rebels to free Luxembourg from SMART!
SMART knows everything, SMART wants us good, SMART is at our service. That's what I was told...
The federation has seen an extraordinary growth in life quality measures
like happiness, peace of mind, health and leisure time. But what is the cost of SMART for Luxembourg?
Indeed, we lost the Trust of the People... But we can still restore some of it.
We just need to free the four districts of Luxembourg from my siblings.

buttons.text: Tell me more about the districts

texts.text: SMART has 4 neural cores
North, East, South and Center.
To disable the Core of a District, you will have to beat the AI of that District.
In the interactive map, you will have to click on each district to play its associated game.
To continue, click on 'Map' button below.

buttons.text: I have destroyed all the cores!

texts.text: In this first game, we will train a ML model
to predict the price of houses based on area!
Press the button 'Train model'
Next, let's see how we can affect the training
Try to add or remove some points and retrain
The model error will change!
You now understand the basics!
All hope is lost! Game Over!
Finally! You are here! We had almost given up hope!
My name is Yoann, I am the head of the student association, here in Belval.
Are you here to destroy the core of SMART?

buttons.text: I need the access codes first

texts.text: To disable this core, you need to enter the correct 3 number code!
Well done! Supervision Core is now disabled!
It says: THERE IS NO TRUST
Once you have the code, come back to see me on the Map!
I have the best face recognition system!
I can recognize the gender, the age, the race of any person, anytime in a fraction of seconds!
Let's have a bet: If you finish this challenge in less than 120s and 12 clicks,
I will acknowledge your superiority, and give you this core's Code.
In this challenge, you need to correctly guess the age of the Faces to beat my record.
On top of the grid, you have a target age. Your task is to find the face which age is the number indicated
You will start from the column on the left, and you can move to the next column if you find the correct face
The current column (where faces are clickable) is showed in green.
When you clic on a face. It appears bigger on the right. It allows you to check if the face is the correct age
If you are sure that it is the right face. Click again on the face. If the face is correct you can move to the next column
The game will start when you press the 'right arrow'. Be quick, be precise!
The game is over! You can play again from the map!
You are in Luxembourg Ville
In this game, we will ask you to do 12 different emotions with your face (among: sad, happy, neutral, surprised)
Each emotion will last 10 seconds. The longer your emotion matches the target, the more points you get
The game will start when you press the 'right arrow'
Game is over! Please record your score
Du bist spät !
Euh... sorry, what?
Dir sidd spéit !
I know, I'm late. But I'm here. How can I help the Resistance?
I'm a journalist working for the Wort! We're raising awareness about SMART
But 'Monitoring' detects and block all offensive tweets. We can't say anything against SMART without censorship
So if I destroy the core, you can spread your messages!
Yes! You just need need to collect 7 non-offensive tweets to get the deactivation code, and we'll do the rest!
But careful, if you use more than 10 clicks or 3 minutes, the system  will reset!
Once you have the code, come back to see me on the Map!
To disable this core, you need to enter the correct 3 number code!
Well done! Monitoring Core is now disabled!
It says: 'BEAUTY IS A SHORT-LIVED TYRANNY' Socrates
In this game, You will get each time two tweets. Both are offensive for humans
However, one of them contains a small change (a letter, a synonym) that makes it non-offensive for the machine.
Can you guess which tweet is non-offensive?
The game will start when you press the 'right arrow'
The game is over!
It says: 'BEAUTY IS A SHORT-LIVED TYRANNY' Socrates
In this game, we will ask you to do 12 different emotions with your face (among: sad, happy, neutral, surprised)
Game is over! Please record your score
L'application se compose de 3 parties auquelles vous accédez par le menu inférieur. Vous pouvez naviguer librement d'un écran à un autre sans perdre votre avancement.
C'est là où vous êtes. C'est celui qui vous donnera les instructions, les énigmes et les informations de la visite.
En cliquant sur le bouton carte, vous accédez à une carte Metz. Sur cette vue, utilisez vos 2 doigts pour glisser la carte

Vous pouvez aussi cliquer sur le bouton 'sablier' à droite pour alterner entre les cartes des différentes époques, l'époque romaine, le moyen âge, et l'époque contemporaine. Vous en aurez besoin pour résoudre des énigmes et trouver votre chemin ;-)
Le bouton à gauche vous permet de vous géolocaliser et centrer la carte autour de vous.
En cliquant sur un lieu de la carte, vous allez poser un petit symbole 'i'. C'est ainsi que vous allez répondre à des énigmes ou indiquer à l'application où vous êtes pour lancer des activités

Cet écran vous permet de sauter directement d'une mission à une autre, sans avoir à faire tous les dialogues. Il vous permettra aussi de retrouver les anciennes réponses données par les personnages que vous rencontrer pour vous aider dans la suite
Essayez maintenant tout ça, et quand vous êtes prets. Allez sur la 'Carte' et cliquez sur le marqueur numéro (1).
